arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ
اَلْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ الَّذِيْ لَمْ يَتَّخِذْ وَلَدًا
وَلَمْ يَكُنْ لَهُ شَرِيكٌ فِيْ الْمُلْكِ
وَلَمْ يَكُنْ لَهُ وَلِيٌّ مِنَ الذُّلِّ
أَنْ تُصَلِّيَ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِهِ
وَأَنْ تَفْعَلَ بِىْ مَا أَنْتَ أَهْلُهُ
translation: In the Name of Allāh, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.
O' Allāh send Your blessings on Muhammad and the family of Muhammad.
All praise be to Allah Who has not taken to Himself a son,
Who has no partner in the Sovereignty
nor has He any protecting friend through dependence.
And magnify Him with all magnificence.
O Allah, verily I beseech You in the name of the situations of Your Dignity
on the pillars of Your Throne,
in the name of Your utmost mercy in Your Book,
in the name of Your Name—the Greatest, the Greatest, the Greatest,
in the name of Your Mention—the Highest, the Highest, the Highest,
and in the name of Your Words the perfect,
to bless Muhammad and his Household
and do to me that which befits You.
transliteration: allāhumma ṣalli `alā muḥammadin wa āli muḥammad
al ḥamdu lillāhil ladhī lam yattakhidh waladā
walam yakun lahu sharīkun fil mulk
walam yakun lahu waliyyun minadh dhull
wa-an taf`ala bī mā anta ahluh
